name: Mahjong Master Pro
description:
Fee games, No annoying ads!!!mahjong master is a free HD solitaire matching game which uses a set of mahjong tiles.
This fun solitaire mahjong master is also known as Chinese Mah-jong
Playing pyramid mahjong solitaire is very simple: find and match pairs of identical tiles. Match all tiles to complete a board.
This board game includes 400 tables. A hint functionality also exist to help you when being stuck on a difficult table.
A refresh functionality is exist to help you refresh table
You will be challenged to eliminate all pieces from the mahjong board.
